thread.title: Al Golden Fired from University of Miami
thread.title_full: Al Golden Fired from University of Miami

author: ARI MONT
title: Al Golden Fired from University of Miami
text:
Privacy Policy | More Newsletters Getty Images TAMPA, FL - SEPTEMBER 28: Miami Hurricanes head coach Al Golden walks the sidelines during the first quarter against the South Florida Bulls on September 28, 2013 at Raymond James Stadium in Tampa, Florida. (Photo by Brian Blanco/Getty Images) The University of Miami has announced that head football coach Al Golden has been relieved of his duties as head football coach after the teams record-setting 58-0 loss to Clemson Saturday. Golden Relieved of his Duties Effective Immediately - https://t.co/vdB4TtmNt9 â€” Miami Hurricanes (@MiamiHurricanes) October 25, 2015 Asisstant coach Larry Scott will serve as the Interim Head Coach for the remainder of the season,. Published 2 hours ago
